name: Twitch Plays: Snail Race (interactive overlay)
description:
Hi guys!

So this is the first Twitch chat interactive game I've decided to sell, if it gives me some profit it will be receiving new skins, new maps, custom personal stream skins, etc.

All the progress made by your viewers will be permanently saved, so each time you execute the game, all your viewers will keep their points and skins automatically. Remember to /mod room_001! (chat bot)
